attributes.action: Ban lorries overtaking on dual carriageways and motorways to reduce congestion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Spending lots of time driving on motorways, it is clear to see lorries which overtake are a huge cause of motorway congestion.  I personally noticed one lorry which took 4 miles to overtake another vehicle.
Making it mandatory for lorries to stick to the inside lane will allow cars to stay at a constant speed rather than having to slow down for these things, thus reducing.
Also there should be harsher penalties for drivers who break the speed limit for lorries.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
